Mixins

  • @mixin font-line($pt)
  • @mixin vertical-align-middle() # Uses inline-block and vertical-align
  • @mixin bg-image-ratio($low, $high)
  • @mixin bg-cover($src)
  • @mixin omega-reset($nth) *to be deprecated in favor of display flex
  • @mixin flex-center([justify-content], [margin]) #uses flexbox to vertical-align and allow wrap
  • @mixin block-center()
